title: Sausages in a red wine sauce with Duchess potatoes
description: A crisp border of potato makes the perfect accompaniment to this tasty dish of sausages cooked in red wine.Equipment and preparation: You will need a piping bag fitted with a star-shaped nozzle.
ingredients: 650g/1½lb floury potatoes, such as Desiree, King Edward or Maris Piper
enough salt to cover the baking tray in a thin layer
salt and freshly ground black pepper
100g/3½oz boiled ham, cut into batons ½cm/¼in thick
1 slice bread, crust removed and diced ½cm/¼in thick
